DATA.TEXT: O-Okay, here it is!
Ooh, yep, that's exactly what I was expecting!
Hey, hey, what did you get? Show me show me
'My dear Hugo, I thereby present the greatest gift of all - tickets to visit the entire universe...
Whoaaaa, the entire universe?? Hey, can I go with you? Then I can continue my adventure!
I... Alright, you can have it... here, for you and your friend.
Huh... But what about you, Hilda? You're not coming with us?
Hugo... I'm sick. I can't leave here.
But soon you'll get better, right? And then we can go on a trip!
I, I don't know.
I got these tickets on a writing competition... I actually wanted to get a new TV, but they sent me this instead...
Oh...
W-Wait, I have something to show you!
Hugo dips out for a moment, running to the kitchen. When he comes back, there's a cup of coffee on three of his tentacles.
Here, this is coffee! This is what adults drink... It's a bit bitter, so also I put in a bit of honey!
Wow... This is actually really good! Hugo, where did you learn to make this?
Oh, I went to a Caf√© planet today!
Hoo, that sounds cool! You've traveled a lot, haven't you?
W-Well, I only got started today, but... yes! I met famous writers, and soldiers, and even four weird monkeys that wanted to sell me stuff!
Monkeys? Hey, monkeys aren't a thing, they're just an invention to sell more shirts!
I swear, I saw four of them! I swear by my fourth tentacle!
Ehh, I don't believe in your oath! I bet it'll fall and another one will grow without the oath.
My dad also swore by his tentacles that he was going to return after the war... but I bet he must have swapped out all of them for another daughter that can go on adventures with him!
My... My dad also doesn't let me go on adventures... but, but I plan on talking up to him when I get back, so I can travel again!
Then, I'll become the greatest adventurer of the universe, and I'll have a lot of stories to tell you until you get better!
B-But what if your dad gets mad at you? Or the war gets so dangerous that you can't leave?
W-Well... Then I'll at least visit you! My dad says the war doesn't get near hospital planets... It's too scared of them!
Hugo... Do you really promise to visit me until I get better?
Yes, I swear by my tenta-
No, no tentacle oath. A real oath.
I swear, Hilda. I swear by everything that exists!
And then, y-you'll get better, and then, you'll become my vice-commander!
Hahaha, alright... but I'll be the leader, okay?
Okay! It's a deal! Until you get better!
U-Until I get better!
The two octopuses high-eight each other, spinning and hitting each tentacle. After that... you depart, leaving Hilda's planet behind.
